title: @classes: Implementando vector com @classes
description:
@classes: Implementando vector com @classes

Implementando vector com @classes

Implemente as seguintes funções do vetor dinâmico.

  • Ele deve ser iniciado utilizando alocação dinâmica e conter além do vetor de dados, size e capacity que definem o tamanho atual e a capacidade do vetor.
#__case create
$init 3
$show
size:0 capacity:3
[]
$end

#__case add
$show
size:0 capacity:1
[]
$push_back 3
$show
size:0 capacity:1
[3]
$push_back 4
$show
size:2 capacity:2
[3, 4]
$push_back 5
$show
size:3 capacity:4
[3, 4, 5]
$push_back 1
$show
size:4 capacity:4
[3, 4, 5, 1]
$push_back 2
$show
size:5 capacity:8
[3, 4, 5, 1, 2]
$end

upload.name: vpl_evaluate.cases
upload.contents:
>>>>>>>> INSERT create
init 3
show
end
======== EXPECT
$init 3
$show
size:0 capacity:3
[]
$end
<<<<<<<< FINISH


>>>>>>>> INSERT add
show
push_back 3
show
push_back 4
show
push_back 5
show
push_back 1
show
push_back 2
show
end
======== EXPECT
$show
size:0 capacity:1
[]
$push_back 3
$show
size:0 capacity:1
[3]
$push_back 4
$show
size:2 capacity:2
[3, 4]
$push_back 5
$show
size:3 capacity:4
[3, 4, 5]
$push_back 1
$show
size:4 capacity:4
[3, 4, 5, 1]
$push_back 2
$show
size:5 capacity:8
[3, 4, 5, 1, 2]
$end
<<<<<<<< FINISH


>>>>>>>> INSERT 01 init vazio 10%
show
end
======== EXPECT
$show
[ ]
$end
<<<<<<<< FINISH


>>>>>>>> INSERT 02 add !%
init 10
show
add 3 4 5 1
show
end
======== EXPECT
$init 10
$show
[ ]
$add 3 4 5 1
$show
[ 3 4 5 1 ]
$end
<<<<<<<< FINISH


>>>>>>>> INSERT 03 add mais !%
init 10
show
add 3 4 5 1
show
add 7
show
end
======== EXPECT
$init 10
$show
[ ]
$add 3 4 5 1
$show
[ 3 4 5 1 ]
$add 7
$show
[ 3 4 5 1 7 ]
$end
<<<<<<<< FINISH


>>>>>>>> INSERT 04 create !%
init 3
status
end
======== EXPECT
$init 3
$status
size:0 capacity:3
$end

>>>>>>>> INSERT 05 add !%

show

$show

$add 3 4 5 1
$show
[ 3 4 5 1 ]
$end

>>>>>>>> INSERT 06 tentar estourar !%

show
add 3 4 5 1
show
add 7 3 2 1
show
end

$init 5
$show
[ ]
$add 3 4 5 1
$show
[ 3 4 5 1 ]
$add 7 3 2 1
$show
[ 3 4 5 1 7 ]
$end
<<<<<<<< FINISH
